CustomField.formula: IF((Initial_Term_Discount__c*100)= 0 ,0, IF((Initial_Term_Discount__c*100)> 0 && (Initial_Term_Discount__c*100) <= 20 && (ACV_Change_Year_1__c > 10000) , 1, IF((Initial_Term_Discount__c*100)> 0 && (Initial_Term_Discount__c*100) <= 40 && (ACV_Change_Year_1__c < 10000) , 1, IF((Initial_Term_Discount__c*100) > 20 && (Initial_Term_Discount__c*100) <= 30, 2, IF((Initial_Term_Discount__c*100)> 30 && (Initial_Term_Discount__c*100) <= 40, 3, IF((Initial_Term_Discount__c*100) > 40 && (ACV_Change_Year_1__c < 10000),3, IF((Initial_Term_Discount__c*100) > 40 && (ACV_Change_Year_1__c > 10000),5,0))))) ))
CustomField.label: Initial Term approver Level
